title: Does my phone support FM radio? If yes, how do I save my favorite channels?
answer:
Yes, your phone supports FM radio. 

 To save a manually found channel, turn it on, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109360) below the current frequency. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109361)
